sentence.Network_en: The arthropod community of Leucaena leucocephala plantation in Yuanmou Arid - hot Valley was investigated in 2005.
sentence.Network_cn: 于2005年对云南元谋干热河谷新银合欢林昆虫群落进行了调查.

sentence.Network_en: ConclusionBoth Leucaena leaf and seed contain component ( s ) which have hypoglycemic effect in diabetic model mice.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论根、干和豆荚的提取物没有降血糖作用;而叶和种子提取物有明显的降血糖效果,提示含有降血糖有效成分.

sentence.Network_en: ObjectiveTo study the hypoglycemic effect of extracts respectively from Leucaena root, trunk, leaf , seed and beanpod.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的研究银合欢根 、 干、 、 子及豆荚的降血糖作用.
